# DevBox Waker - Project Instructions

This project contains a PowerShell script that automatically wakes a DevBox from hibernation when you login to your Windows laptop.

## Project Structure
- PowerShell script to wake DevBox from hibernation
- Task Scheduler configuration for automatic execution on login
- Setup script to configure the scheduled task

## Development Guidelines
- Use PowerShell for all scripts
- Follow Windows Task Scheduler best practices
- Ensure scripts handle errors gracefully
